about_the_game:
Welcome to KALEIDOLA, a third-person action puzzle game that takes you on a journey through a kaleidoscope-inspired world. Go on a mind-bending adventure that challenges players to think creatively and adapt to each new environment.

unleash Your Creativity

As you encounter roadblocks along the way, don't give up. Master the art of switching between 3D mode and Kaleidoscope mode to achieve your objectives.

kaleidoscope Mode

Unlock KALEIDOLA's power when a flashing object is on screen. With a simple press of a button, take control and watch the creativity unfold. Transform objects, paths, and obstacles to overcome any dead-ends that seem impossible to pass.

designed With Passion

KALEIDOLA is a testament to the love and creativity of indie developer, HAYATOSKIE. Immerse yourself in their colourful world, where every twist and turn reveals their commitment to puzzle innovation and originality.

short_description: KALEIDOLA is a third-person action puzzle game with a kaleidoscope-inspired twist. Dive into the mind-bending world and unlock powers that transform objects, obstacles, and paths with the click of a button to overcome seemingly impossible dead-ends. Discover what your creativity can achieve.
